title: FS: T3 Turkey Red Sullivan PSA 4.5

posts.post_title: FS: T3 Turkey Red Sullivan PSA 4.5
posts.post_content: I received this card in a trade with another board member and it just  looks out of place with all my 1's and 2's. Price is $375 delivered and insured, back is clean checklist back, please email if you would like a back scan to  [URL="andrewhahn55@gmail.com"]andrewhahn55@gmail.com[/URL]
